Installation
1. Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Log in to your MeroShare account.
3. Calculate all wacc in My Purchase Source.
4. Visit the WACC section to ensure all relevant data is updated.
5. Open your portfolio to view the enhanced information.

Frequently Asked Questions
Is this associated with CDSC/Meroshare? 
- No, this is an independent hobby project developed over two days with subsequent bug fixes.

Why doesn't it account for broker commission? 
- Broker commission applies only after selling, and calculations vary based on stock total values and selling quantities.

Is it secure? What about privacy? 
- The extension adheres to Chrome Web Store security standards. All data processing occurs locally within your browser. For verification, you can remove and reinstall the extension.

When will it reach version 1.0? 
- Version 1.0 is planned for release upon reaching 10,000 users.

My antivirus flagged the extension as malware. Why? 
- New extensions may trigger false positives. For more information, please refer to Google's support article.

The extension seems to include sold units in WACC calculations. Is this correct? 
- Please revisit the "My WACC" section. The extension does not track individual buy/sell transactions.

Is it compatible with other browsers? 
- The extension is available for Firefox on my website. For other Chromium-based browsers, please use the Chrome Web Store version.

What are the future development plans? 
- While there are no concrete plans at present, several ideas are under consideration pending available development time.
